name: CONFORMANCE CRITERIA: Locate and Identify existing underground services
METHOD OF INSPECTION: Visual Inspection of drawings and identify
DOCUMENTATION & VERIFICATION: Service plans from client
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA: Working platform adequate for piling rigs
METHOD OF INSPECTION: DCP testing undertaken to confirm in situ soil adequate for Piling rig
PERSONNEL RESPONSIBLE: LTE Engineer, LTE Site Supervisor
DOCUMENTATION & VERIFICATION: DCP test results, Working Platform Certificate
APPLICABLE STANDARD: Construction Drawings and Pile design document
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA: Set-out of Pile locations as shown of drawings
METHOD OF INSPECTION: Visual Inspection, survey set out
APPLICABLE STANDARD: Construction Drawings, Pile design document, Pile QA document, AS2159
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA: Ensure hole dia, depth, all as per design documentation and QA document, hole within positional tolerance as per AS2159
METHOD OF INSPECTION: Visual Inspection, tape measure
APPLICABLE STANDARD: Construction Drawings, Pile design document, Pile QA document, AS2159
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA: Reo cage as per design/Pile QA document, placed to correct RL, spacers used to ensure cover to cage
APPLICABLE STANDARD: Construction Drawings, Pile design document, Pile QA document, AS2159, AS3600

CONFORMANCE CRITERIA: Concrete 50 MPa, superplasticised for piling application. Positively guided away from reinforcement during pouring. Concrete testing undertaken min 3 cylinders per 50m3 poured on site
